definition: to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to levitate heavenwards (a Daoist success)/to take off/to soar (of prices)
to ascend/to rise to the rank of/to promote/to hoist/liter/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth dou 斗[dou3]
variant of 升[sheng1]/to ascend/to rise in rank

sentences.english: Cliff is soaring Zhenwu Tati heaven place.
sentences.chinese: 飞升崖是真武大帝仙游的地方。

sentences.english: With the cost of gasoline going through the roof, not having to drive is important for everyone.
sentences.chinese: 随着汽油价格的飞升，不用开车对每一个人都很重要。

sentences.english: At that moment, I became an immortal.
While of course it has to overcome the gravity of material desires.
sentences.chinese: 当然，心灵的飞升需要克服物欲的重力。

sentences.english: I ascend, I float in the regions of your love O man.
sentences.chinese: 我凌空飞升，我飘拂在你那爱的疆域，啊，男人。

sentences.english: Unemployment ballooned to 19 percent from 14 percent.

definition: lower bound (math.)/world of mortals/(of Gods) to descend to the world of mortals
time immemorial/origin of the universe/the world
Mahayana, the Great Vehicle/Buddhism based on the Mayahana sutras, as spread to Central Asia, China and beyond/also pr. [Da4 cheng2]
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
